issue.title: Cached models lose server and name information

content.raw:
I tried creating directories with all these special characters on ubuntu and mac and they worked:
https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/905231/information-about-the-characters-that-you-cannot-use-in-site-names-fol

I haven't tried on Windows but assuming that's true,  I imagine a case where a linux user uploads a model with some of these characters but Windows users will have problem downloading and saving that model to disk.
content.html:
I tried creating directories with all these special characters on ubuntu and mac and they worked: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/905231/information-about-the-characters-that-you-cannot-use-in-site-names-fol

I haven't tried on Windows but assuming that's true, I imagine a case where a linux user uploads a model with some of these characters but Windows users will have problem downloading and saving that model to disk.
